moduleDescription: Get the content of files stored in your server without ajax. A file path or list of file paths is passed and added to a queue that uses an invisible iframe to load the files content sequentially. This queue behaves like a ring buffer. Loading progress can be monitored by passing a function that will be called on every update load event. The progress value is made available to this function through one passed argument. Loading finished can be monitored by passing a function that will be called when this event occurs. The output list is made to this function by passing an argument. The output list is an array of objects with the structure: {name:'file name extracted from filepath', content:'string with file content'}
